column2: Through diplomatic maneuvering, we can force independent countries within our sphere to return lands which are rightfully ours. While this is a preferable alternative to war, some see this as nothing more than backstabbing our allies and would rather have this tactic done away with.

Through diplomatic maneuvering, we can force independent countries within our sphere to return lands which are rightfully ours. After taking our cores from one of our sphered countries, we will lose all influence in that country, and the relations between our two states will be severely damaged. Also, to avoid any map on the mess should all a countryâ€™s cores be our cores as well, then we will be completely annex the country along with their uncored lands. While this is a preferable alternative to war, some see this as nothing more than backstabbing our allies and would rather have this tactic done away with.
Our overlords have begun the process of diplomatic annexation.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ owns lands that should be rightfully under our control. Through diplomatic pressure and threats of military action, we can force $FROMCOUNTRY$ to surrender any $COUNTRY_ADJ$ cores.
